member.name: ISyncMgrConflictItems.GetCount
member.param: A pointer to the item count.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflictItems.GetItem
member.summary: Gets a specified conflict data item.
member.param: The index of the conflict item to retrieve.
When this method returns successfully, contains a pointer to a structure that contains information about the conflict.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrConflictItems
member.summary: Exposes methods that get conflict item data and item count.
